fields.headline: How to deal with mosquitoes
fields.bodyText:  They are made by The Edge Company, 17 Kit Street, Keene, NH 03431, US, (tel: 1 800 732 9976, www.edgeco.com). There are two types of device; one is about the size of a large wristwatch and costs $19.95; the other is like a medium size chest microphone and costs $5.95. Credit cards are OK. There is only one problem: Edge does not seem keen to send things abroad. I got mine by giving a friend's address in the States. Michael Mann  The device that Helen Jacobs wants is made by: Servicroma, C/Foc, 23, 08038 Barcelona, Spain (tel: 93 223 45 64, www.radarcan.com. I bought an SC-7 model for £5 in a hardware shop in Soria, Spain. It works very well and seems to run forever on a single AA battery. Some jokers in the UK are apparently trying to sell them for £20. Aidan Rowe
